actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend section 205 of the Flood Control Act.

summary.text: Increases to $75,000,000 (formerly $25,000,000) the amount of money the Secretary of the Army may allot in any fiscal year for the construction of small projects for flood control under the Flood Control Act not specifically authorized by Congress. Increases to $2,000,000 (formerly $1,000,000) the amount which may be alloted for such projects in any single locality. (Amends 33 U.S.C. 701s)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 205 of the Flood Control Act.
